effects.1: You were cremated alive and all that remains of who you once were are the ashes of our flesh and bone.
effects.2: Flesh, fat, and muscle have burned away to reveal scorched and crumbling bone.
effects.3: Your flesh is too blackened to even be edible by the crows.
effects.4: Your friends might find the smell of your cooked body pleasant if they weren’t your friends.
effects.5: The scarred ruin of your flesh betrays your fiery end.
effects.6: Ghastly burns reveal your harsh demise.

effects.1: Flesh, fat, and muscle have burned away to reveal scorched and crumbling bone.
effects.2: Your flesh is too blackened by fire to even be edible by the crows.
effects.3: Your friends might find the smell of your cooked body pleasant if they weren’t your friends.
effects.4: The scarred ruin of your flesh betrays your fiery end.
effects.5: Ghastly burns reveal your harsh demise.
effects.6: Your corpse is largely intact and ready for a noble funeral.

condition_recovery: You are mortally wounded. You die unless healed to 1 hp within 1 round. If you are healed, you need 1 month of bed rest.

effects.1: All your limbs are burned off, your lungs are scorched, and your face hideously scarred (as per both arms burned off both, both legs burned off, lungs blackened, gruesome scarring)
effects.2: Your eyes, ears, nose, and lips sloughed off under the terrible heat (as per both eyes lost, both ears lost, lips and tongue lost, and gruesome scarring)
effects.3: Both legs are burned off (DEX reduced to 3 for AC purposes, two crutches required, movement reduced by 60’, cannot force march).
effects.4: Both arms are burned off (cannot climb, use weapons or items, open locks, remove traps, or similar actions).
effects.5: Both your eyes were melted in the heat (blinded, -4 attack throws, no LOS, movement reduced to ¼ normal, -2 to surprise rolls)
effects.6: Your fiery screams just left your lips and tongues to be burned away (mute, cannot speak, cast spells, or use magic items involving speech, and -4 to reaction rolls).

condition_recovery: You are grievously wounded. You die unless healed to 1 hp within 1 turn. If you are healed, you need 2 weeks of bed rest.

effects.1: One leg and one arm were burned off; the other half was merely reduced to pink scar tissue (as per one leg lost, one arm lost, notable scarring)
effects.2: Both of your ears and most of your face were burned away (-2 to Listening throws, -2 to surprise rolls, gruesome scarring)
effects.3: One leg is burned off (crutch is required, movement reduced by 30’, DEX reduced by 1/3 for AC purposes).
effects.4: One arm is burned off (cannot climb, use shields, dual wield, or use two-handed weapon).
effects.5: One of your eyes melted in the heat (-2 to missile attack throws).
effects.6: Your lips and jaw were burned white (notable scarring)

condition_recovery: You are critically wounded. You die unless healed to 1 hp within 1 day. If you are healed, you need 1 week of bed rest.

effects.1: Your struggle to draw breath through scorched and blackened lungs (must rest for 2 turns every 6, wilder-ness movement reduced by 1/3, cannot force march, CON reduced by 1/3)
effects.2: The flame burns away your genitals and leaves just blackened lumps (cannot reproduce, -3 to reaction rolls if loss of manhood / womanhood is known).
effects.3: One foot is burned off (peg required, movement reduced by 30’, DEX reduced by 1/3 for AC purposes)
effects.4: One hand is burned off (cannot dual-wield or use two-handed weapons).
effects.5: The flesh of one of your cheeks is pink and lump with a large burn scar (notable scarring).
effects.6: Your fingernails are blackened from the burning (minor scarring).

condition_recovery: You are shock. You recover with 1 hp. You need magical healing and one night of bed rest, or 1 week of rest.

effects.1: Your face melts like wax and chars like beef in the flame (gruesome scarring).
effects.2: Your ear is burned off (-1 to Listening throws and -1 to surprise rolls).
effects.3: 1d3 toes on one foot are burned off (3 lost toes on one foot makes foot useless).
effects.4: 1d3 fingers on one hand are burned off (3 lost fingers on one hand makes hand useless.)
effects.5: The smallest finger on one hand is burned off (3 lost fingers on a hand makes it useless).
effects.6: Ghostly visions of lost companions flicker before your eyes as you awaken.

condition_recovery: You were knocked out. You recover with 1 hp. You need magical healing or one night of bed rest.

effects.1: The pain of the burns never goes away – never (-1 to all initiative rolls).
effects.2: Your hair burned away, and half your torso and one arm are pink and lumpy with burn scars (two notable scarrings).
effects.3: Your hair caught fire and burned away, leaving your scalp blackened and hairline patchy (notable scarring).
effects.4: Your hand has a white and ragged scar where it burned (minor scarring).
effects.5: Ghostly visions of lost companions flicker before your eyes as you awaken.
effects.6: A vision of the afterlife haunts you, then fades as you awaken.

condition_recovery: You were just dazed. You recover immediately with 1hp. You do not need any bed rest.

effects.1: Your scarred skin aches in bad weather (-1 to initiative in Frigid, Drizzly, or Rainy weather).
effects.2: Half your torso and one arm are pink and lumpy with burn scars (notable scarring).
effects.3: Your shoulder has a white and ragged scar where the flames burned hot (minor scarring).
effects.4: Ghostly visions of lost companions flicker before your eyes as you awaken.
effects.5: A vision of the afterlife haunts you, then fades as you awaken.
effects.6: The Choosers of the Slain pass you by, and you awaken.
